In Ayurveda, E. officinalis is used for the treatment of peptic ulcer, dyspepsia, altered gastrointestinal motility (diarrhea, constipation, vomiting), and symptoms from pancreatitis, piles, liver disorders, diabetes, tuberculosis, and other lung infections. It has anti‚Äêinflammatory and antistress effects. Regular intake of E. officinalis fruit has been advised for the general maintenance of health and preventive healthcare. External application is prescribed for alopecia or baldness, toothache, and ophthalmic conditions.
